|rad1chip2 = Broadcom;BCM2050; |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 |rad1correv = |rad1cap = }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== OEM Gemtek WX5525 (WX5525X_V00) ==Links of Interest== [http://support.gateway.com/s/Manuals/Desktops/8509437.pdf Manual] [https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?pid=91465 SparkLAN WX-6615 on the OpenWrt forums]
:Per this post, the device should be near identical to the TRENDnet TEW-411BRP vA, Sitecom WL-111, and the SparkLAN WX-6615 ==Pictures==
